target: Okay. The guesthouse is Kirkwood House and it is moderately priced, located at 172 Chesterton Road Reference Number CB41DA .
context: <user> Can I please book a train to bishops stortford on saturday? <system> Where would you like to depart from? <user> I'd like to leave Cambridge and arrive by 17:30. <system> I have the TR0121 train available. It departs from Cambridge at 15:29 and arrives at Bishops Stortford at 16:07. Would you like to book a ticket? <user> Yes. Please book for 2 people. <system> Your passage has been booked. 16.16 GPB will be payable at the station and your reference number is ZVFTQ0X3 . Will that be all? <user> Thank you. I also need help finding a place to stay. I'd prefer a guesthouse with free wifi <system> May I ask a price range that you would like?<user> I dont care about price. It needs to be in the north, however. <system> We have many guesthouses located in the north, many of which are 4 stars. May I recommend the Kirkwood House located in the north for a moderate price with 4 stars?<user> Does the Kirkwood House include free parking? <system> Yes it most certainly does.<user> What's the price range, postcode and address please <system> The Kirkwood House is moderately priced and is located at 172 Chesteron Road, CB4 1DA. Can I help you with anything else today?<user> No thank you that is all I need today. <system>
